LanguageData.DMS_AntiMaterialRifle.label: mech AMR
LanguageData.DMS_AntiMaterialRifle.description:
High caliber sniper rifle made to be used by MS-4E Jadger automatroids to snipe armored target at long range.
This weapon is designed specially for automatroid use, thus normal human may be unable to use them normally without external assistance equipment or being extra strong.
LanguageData.DMS_AntiMaterialRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_AntiMaterialRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultRifle.label: mech assault rifle
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultRifle.description:
a full metal assault rifle designed for mech soldiers, with a picatinny rail as long as the gun itself for all tacticool needs.
This weapon is designed specially for automatroid use, thus normal human may be unable to use them normally without external assistance equipment or being extra strong.
